body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_acr_test,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0075]/value as T0_overall_test_status_timestamp,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.laboratory_test_analyte.v1]/items[at0001]/value as T0_acr_result
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result.v1]
  )
WHERE a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value/defining_code/code_string='NPU03918'
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
